description: Numbers n such that sum of digits = twice number of digits.
example: 141 is a term as the arithmetic mean of the digits is (1+4+1)/3 = 2.
prog: (MAGMA) [ n: n in [1..1310] | &+Intseq(n) eq 2*#Intseq(n) ];  // Bruno Berselli, Jun 30 2011
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, May 03 2001
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), May 16 2001
